attributes.additional_details:
Diabetics can improve their HbA1 level using the sensor, as it’s quick and convenient to regularly scan. 

Good glucose control reduces the risk of complications, which are very expensive to treat.

These devices can track of the glucose readings over the last 8 hours, helping diabetics to improve control through using these insights.

The NHS could reduce consultations as data can be uploaded. By making a sensor affordable, more people can gain access and everyone can benefit.
attributes.background:
Many diabetes are forced to 100% self-fund the use of flash glucose monitoring systems 

This petition is to recognise that there is no justification in not at least offering the sensor to diabetics for the difference in cost between using test strips and lancets and the `freestyle libre sensor.
